name: Group Projects
description:
GD67 Group Projects

Vancouver Film School (VFS)'s Game Design Program is a One-Year Intensive Post-Secondary Program where students experience the entire game development cycle and develop specialized skills in coding, game art, and level design.

Final Projects

Original games created solo or in teams during a 6 month time span at the end of the program.

Dad To The Bone Tagline: 3D top-down co-op hordeslayer in the Multiverse of Dadness
VFS Core Team: Brandon Reynoso, Chris Ip, Hugo Fonseca, Lucas Tormin, Nick Murphy, Pedro Zorilla
VFS Collaborators: Will Hamilton, Alex Ayala, Henrique Martins Jacinto, Andres Valero, Joel van der Lee, Tyler Jacques, Taylor Moorey, Taegan McNeil, Rafael Milan, Nick Huneault, Margeax Coburn, Juan Cruz, Ismael Zgaib, Isabel Cacacho, Hojune Kwak
Other Collaborators: Ben Lenz Hunter Allen, "Brother Jon" Ingham, Bert Canete Exorship Tagline: Two-player top-down chaotic couch co-op ghost-removal game.
VFS Core Team: Dan Erickson, AJ Roberts, Liam Brennan, Andrew Zimmer, Jose Munguia
VFS Collaborators: Andrea Padilla, Carlos Ruiz, Danitza Ramirez, Sawyer King Re-Vert Tagline: Single-Player 3D First-Person Cyberpunk Stealth Game
VFS Core Team: Samuele Guerrini, Sean Solis, Rolf Angelo San Jose
VFS Collaborators: Cory Smith, May Goddard, Sam Staples, Omid E. Joozdani
Other Collaborators: Andrea Lunghi Sweet Slayer Tagline: Local Multiplayer, split screen, 1st Person Shooter in a Candy World
VFS Core Team: Ana Carolina Matos Franca, Juan Serna, Karla Mercado, Leonardo Alvarado, Santiago Lagunes
VFS Collaborators: Christian Sprinkhuysen, Pablo Palomino Gómez, Gwen Gyeongmin Hwang Demon Hunter Team Projects

Original games created in a team-based environment during a 3 month time span halfway through the program.

Into the Forest Tagline: Single-Player, 3rd Person Fixed camera angle Horror game
VFS Core Team: Sean Solis, Chris Ip, Rolf Angelo San Jose, Hugo Fonseca Robo-Dash Tagline: Single-Player, 3D Side-Scrolling Isometric Platformer game
VFS Core Team: Samuele Guerrini, Ana Carolina Matos França, Jose Munguia T.A.G. Tagline: 1v1 top-down competitive local multiplayer sports game
VFS Core Team: Dan Erickson, Liam Brennan, Pedro Zorilla, Leonardo Alvarado Bomberangers Tagline: Top-down 3D arena combat game for 2-4 players with explosive boomerangs
VFS Core Team: Brandon Reynoso, Juan Serna Cobo, Lucas Tormin, Nick Murph The Adventures of Lizzie the Lizard Tagline: Single player Third-Person 3D Platformer Ball-Rolling game
VFS Core Team: AJ Roberts, Santiago Lagunes, Andrew Zimmer, Karla Mercado, Juan David
